constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 136 (Tuesday, August 16, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. CROW:
H.R. 8718.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Intelligence Community Coordinator for Russian Atrocities
Accountability Act of 2022
Article 1, Section 8 of the Constitution gives Congress the
power to make laws that are necessary and proper to carry out
its enumerated powers.
[Page H7712]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select).

title: Intelligence Community Coordinator for Russian Atrocities Accountability Act of 2022
